title: The REDMAGIC 7 Pro is now available for purchase starting at £679/$799/€799
content:
The REDMAGIC 7 Pro is now available for purchase. The company touts its latest handset as a “beast of a gaming handset” and with good reason. The company has pulled out all of the stops to create what could potentially be one of the best Android phones for gaming. The REDMAGIC 7 Pro not only

The post The REDMAGIC 7 Pro is now available for purchase starting at £679/$799/€799 appeared first on XDA.
description: The REDMAGIC 7 Pro is now available for purchase, offering a Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 SoC, impressive 120Hz display, and more.
